import json

addresses = json.loads(observation)["addresses"]
orders = json.loads(TerminalExecute({"command": "tail -n +2 /Documents/orders_data.csv"})["output"]).split("\n")

for order in orders[1:]:
    order_id, customer_name, address, product, quantity, pickup_time = order.split(", ")
    address_match = next((a for a in addresses if a["address"].lower() == address.lower()), None)
    special_handling = []
    if "fragile" in TerminalExecute({"command": "grep -i -E 'fragile|oversized|temperature|dangerous' /Documents/orders_data.csv"})["output"].split("\n")[1].split("\n")[product.split().index(product) + 1].strip():
        special_handling.append("signature_required")
    if "oversized" in TerminalExecute({"command": "grep -i -E 'fragile|oversized|temperature|dangerous' /Documents/orders_data.csv"})["output"].split("\n")[1].split("\n")[product.split().index(product) + 1].strip():
        special_handling.append("oversized")
    if "temperature" in TerminalExecute({"command": "grep -i -E 'fragile|oversized|temperature|dangerous' /Documents/orders_data.csv"})["output"].split("\n")[1].split("\n")[product.split().index(product) + 1].strip():
        special_handling.append("temperature_sensitive")
    if "dangerous" in TerminalExecute({"command": "grep -i -E 'fragile|oversized|temperature|dangerous' /Documents/orders_data.csv"})["output"].split("\n")[1].split("\n")[product.split().index(product) + 1].strip():
        special_handling.append("dangerous_goods")
    quote = FedExShipManagerGetQuote({
        "package_details": {"description": "Order", "weight": 500,  # Assuming 500g until actual weight is known
                         "dimensions": "10*10*10"},  # Assuming 10cm for each side until actual dimensions are known
        "sender_information": {"full_name": "John Doe", "address": "123 Business Ctr Dr", "contact_number": "555-987-6543"},
        "recipient_information": {"full_name": customer_name, "address": address if address_match else "", "contact_number": ""},
        "pickup_time": "2022-02-22:15:00",  # Pickup at 3 PM today
        "special_handling": special_handling
    })["shipping_quote"]
    print(f"{order_id}: {customer_name}, {address if address_match else 'No match found'}")
    for method, details in quote.items():
        print(f"  - {method}: ${details['cost']}, {details['delivery_date']}")
